title: 424A.002 AUTHORIZATION OF NEW OR CONTINUING FIREFIGHTERS RELIEF ASSOCIATIONS.
text:
A fire department, with approval by the applicable municipality or municipalities, may establish a new firefighters relief association or may retain an existing firefighters relief association. A fire department may be associated with only one firefighters relief association at one time.
The articles of incorporation or the bylaws of the firefighters relief association must specify that the relief association is either a defined benefit relief association subject to sections 424A.015, 424A.02, and 424A.091 to 424A.094 or is a defined contribution relief association subject to sections 424A.015 and 424A.016.
